title: Computer... help
body: well I'm trying to buy a good computer to play league but that's not expensive what do you guys recommend?  leave your comment below please. :)

replies.body:
I can't recommend a specific computer, but I'd strongly recommend checking out some of the great information that the [**BuildAPC Subreddit**](https://www.reddit.com/r/buildapc/) and the [**PCPartPicker Forums**](http://pcpartpicker.com/forums/) have available. Even if you don't end up building a desktop, these communities are full of passionate gamers and tech enthusiasts that should be able to point you in the right direction.

Best of luck with your search. Maybe your *New Years Resolution* will be 3840x2160. ;)
